subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Deron Williams out of the Nets’ lineup Monday against the Indiana Pacers, Tyshawn Taylor stepped in and provided a sudden, unexpected glimpse at his N.B.A. potential.
snippet: With Deron Williams out of the Nets’ lineup Monday against the Indiana Pacers, Tyshawn Taylor stepped in and provided a sudden, unexpected glimpse at his N.B.A. potential.
